passage_text: Dominick /do-mi-nick/ [3 sylls.] as a boys' name. Dominick's name origin is Latin, and Dominick means lord. Dominick is an alternate spelling of Dominic (Latin). Domenick is a conventional last name. Kreatif forms: Deminick, Dorminick, Duminick.

What does Dominick mean, popularity, numerology and more. The name Dominick is of Latin origin. The meaning of Dominick is of the lord, belonging to G-d. It is also of English origin, where its meaning is belongs to the Lord.

Dominick is a very popular first name for males (#486 out of 1220, Top 40%) and also a very popular last name for all people (#6442 out of 150436, Top 4%). (2000 U.S. Census). Presented below is the baby name popularity of Dominick for boys.

American Meaning: The name Dominick is an American baby name. In American the meaning of the name Dominick is: Lord. Latin Meaning: The name Dominick is a Latin baby name. In Latin the meaning of the name Dominick is: From dominkus, meaning 'of the Lord'. Famous bearer: St Dominic founded the Dominican order of preaching friars.
In American the meaning of the name Dominic is: Lord. Latin Meaning: The name Dominic is a Latin baby name. In Latin the meaning of the name Dominic is: From dominkus, meaning 'of the Lord'.
